item.title: Moonbirds: Holders of the relevant NFTs with Towns Wallets bound before the snapshot are eligible for the TOWNS airdrop
item.description: On August 5th, according to an announcement from the NFT project Moonbirds, holders of Moonbirds, Mythic, and Oddity who had bound their Towns Wallets before the snapshot are eligible to receive a TOWNS airdrop. It is crucial to note that the airdrop query address is not the user's NFT holding address but the Towns Wallets address bound to the holding address.

item.title: President Trump will sign an executive order to protect cryptocurrency companies and individuals from the impact of "debanking."
item.description: On August 5th, as per The Wall Street Journal, President Trump is in the process of preparing to sign an executive order that focuses on financial institutions engaging in de-risking behavior towards businesses and individuals, including cryptocurrency companies.Based on a draft of the executive order that was accessed by the media, the decree intends to address the discrimination against cryptocurrency companies and conservative individuals. It poses a threat of fines against banks that cut off customer relationships for political reasons and imposes consent orders or other disciplinary actions. The executive order also directs regulatory agencies to conduct investigations into whether any financial institutions have violated the Equal Credit Opportunity Act, antitrust laws, or consumer financial protection laws. Nevertheless, the executive order does not name any specific companies. Sources with knowledge of the matter stated that the executive order could be signed as early

item.title: Binance Alpha and Binance Futures will launch INFINIT (IN) on August 7.
item.description: August 5th, as per the official announcement, Binance Alpha is set to list and commence trading for INFINIT (IN) on August 7, 2025, at 17:00 (UTC+8).Furthermore, the Binance futures platform will initiate the INUSDT perpetual contract on August 7, 2025, at 18:30 (UTC+8), with a leverage of up to 50x.INFINIT is an artificial intelligence platform that enables users to utilize AI agents to detect, evaluate, and execute opportunities, thereby facilitating DeFi.

item.title: Security Alert: Hackers Launch Large-Scale Attack on TikTok Shop Users
item.description: August 5th. According to the latest report by the security research firm CTM360, a hacker operation named "ClickTok" is conducting attacks globally and targeting TikTok Shop users. The attackers have set up more than 10,000 spoofed websites and 5,000 malicious applications. They use hybrid fraud methods to steal user account credentials and spread the SparkKitty spyware with the intention of hijacking users' cryptocurrency wallets.This activity has expanded beyond the 17 countries officially included in TikTok Shop. The attackers mainly take advantage of low-cost domains (such as.top and.shop) to establish phishing websites and spread malicious programs through malicious QR codes and download links.Security experts recommend that users access TikTok Shop through the official application, carefully verify the authenticity of websites, and avoid downloading software from unknown sources.

item.title: Meme Coin Perpetual Contract DEX Superp Launches Content Incentive Campaign, Earned Points Correspond to Subsequent Airdrop
item.description: August 5th. According to official channels, the Meme Coin perpetual contract DEX Superp has now initiated a content incentive campaign. This event will run from August 4th at 6 pm (UTC+8) to August 11th at 6 pm (UTC+8). Users are able to post articles or videos on X discussing Superp and mention the Superp official account (@Superp_xyz). Then, they can submit the tweet link and email on the Superp official website.The team indicated that users can reflect on their Superp product experiences and suggestions in the content, analyze the product's innovative mechanisms, discuss the future development of Superp, Superp's TGE, and price performance.The points obtained from participating in the event will be evaluated manually based on the quality of user tweets, engagement, and influence. The points will be directly proportional to the ratio of the subsequent airdrop. The points will be distributed within 3 days after submitting the tweet.Previously, Binance Alpha was the first platfor

item.title: Abstract Core Developer: In the coming months, the focus of development will be on the DeFi ecosystem
item.description: August 5, The core developer of Abstract, @0xCygaar, recently stated that in the months to come, the development of the Abstract DeFi ecosystem will be a key focus. The development team will make efforts to assist DeFi developers in achieving success within the Abstract ecosystem.

item.title: Ethereum's Largest Whale Address BMNR's Position Reaches Unrealized Gains of $1.18 Billion
item.description: August 5th. According to the most recent announcement, by August 3rd at 6:30 PM Eastern Time, the institution that holds the largest amount of ETH on Ethereum, BitMine (BMNR), holds 833,137 ETH. The price per ETH is $3,491.86.Based on the current Ethereum market price of $3,634, BMNR's current unrealized gain ratio is 4.07%, and the unrealized gain is $118.4 million.

item.title: KyberSwap Introduces FairFlow, MEV Revenue Selectively Returned to LP
item.description: On August 5th, KyberSwap declared that it is set to launch a novel LP reward mechanism named FairFlow on August 6th. FairFlow is a Swap Hook based on Uniswap V4, aiming to return the arbitrage profits that were originally grabbed by external MEV arbitrageurs back to the liquidity providers (LPs). LPs can obtain rewards without staking LP tokens.The core mechanism is the Equilibrium Gain (EG) sharing plan: KyberSwap's aggregator integrates with the FairFlow pool. When a trade presents an arbitrage opportunity, the FairFlow Hook seizes a portion of the profit and distributes 70% proportionally to LPs, with 30% allocated to the platform's ecosystem. EG rewards are distributed weekly in a dual token format, and LP tokens can be used in other DeFi protocols simultaneously to earn additional yield.According to the official experimental data, the APR of the FairFlow pool is higher than that of traditional pools. For instance, in the ETH-cbBTC pair on the Base network, within 189 hours, th

item.title: Data: Over 70% of Linea LXP holders hold no more than 2250 tokens
item.description: On August 5th, based on Dune Data, the distribution of Linea LXP holders is as follows:? 1 - 1500 LXP: 40.0%;? 1501 - 2250 LXP: 30.4%;? 2251 - 2800 LXP: 10.2%;? 2801 - 3500 LXP: 8.1%;? 3501 - 5000 LXP: 7.2%;? 5000+ LXP: 4.0%;According to previous public information, 9% (6.48 billion LINEA) of the total supply of LINEA tokens is directly allocated to LXP holders.

item.title: Swiss Crypto Bank AMINA is launching the SUI token trading and custody service, with plans to offer SUI staking service.
item.description: August 5th: The Swiss crypto bank AMINA Bank has emerged as the world's first regulated bank to provide SUI token trading and custody services.It is reported that SUI is the native asset of the Sui blockchain, aiming to replace traditional Web2 infrastructure and support enterprise-grade low-latency applications and efficient transaction processing. AMINA plans to offer SUI staking services in the future and has opened buy and sell functions for customers with unrestricted trading volume. At the same time, governance tools have been incorporated to support compliance and auditing processes.In previous news, the Swiss bank AMINA supported the custody and trading of Ripple's stablecoin RLUSD.
